name: Secured May Fly Throwing Grenade
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Throwing Grenade Basic Kit" "165123" #L "Pseudo-Nano Multibenzonoxydant Sulphosalycilic Liquid" "165121" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Pseudo-Nano Multibenzonoxydant Sulphosalycilic Liquid + Throwing Grenade Basic Kit = #L "Secured May Fly Throwing Grenade" "165119" Skills: | BE | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Hmmm not that useful as you can only carry one at a time...
